item.title: Online travel insurance offer now available from AIG Singapore
item.description:
AIG Singapore has introduced a new digital travel insurance product, Travel Guard Direct, designed to improve customer experience from purchase to claim. This innovative product uses data to provide travelers with valuable insights about their destinations. Travel Guard Direct is the first of its kind in Singapore, offering real-time claims information for popular destinations in Asia Pacific, the US, and the UK. This allows customers to make more informed decisions about their coverage by understanding the risks associated with their travel destinations...
